wideshagatha wi wasarak gathawethma paluwa kansiyen hitha gilan wannata aasanna wuyen antharjalaye punchi idam kaballak ma wenuwen wenkarawa gathimi...eda medathura ma hata thani rakinuye ee thulin dana handunagath sundara hadawath samuhayayi...mage mathakaya harinam mita wasara dekakata pera aya thaba giya sundara satahanak adada hondin mathaka thiye..thanikama uruma wu hadawathaka shokalapayak lesin liya thibu ema satahana mehidi satahan kirimata maliwemi...manda eya ma pamanak dana sitiya yuthu,rasa windiya yuthu deyak yayi mage thrushnadhika hadawatha ka gasa kiyana bawini...ewak patan athiwu apage aadhyathmiya bandima wisthara kirimata apahasu bawak hange...manda witeka soyuriyak witeka mawak,witeka yeheliyak,witeka aagnyadayaka wariyak lesa mage hithe assak mullak nara wijaramana wu aa pasugiya sathiye aaradhana sahagatha nirmanayaka satahanak thaba dina kihipayak sangawa gos thibuni..
